description.narrative:
Benefits to farmers: NSC provides high quality seeds and technical advice to a large number of farmers across the country, which would lead to increased production yield, better output quality and reduced farming losses, hence helping to improve farmers' livelihood. In addition, Pan-Saladbowl plans to establish a contract farming model in Lam Dong province which would directly benefit farmers.
Food security: the financing will contribute to the global food security through supporting the growth of leading seed companies and production of vegetables and fruits which is an importance part of daily human diet.
Standard setting: Pan Farm is keen to adopt international best practices especially in the food safety area, which would have significant demonstration effect on the overall agriculture industry in the country.

table, .k-table{ border-collapse:collapse; width:100%; table-layout:fixed; margin-bottom: 15px;} .k-table, .k-table td, table, table td {outline: 0;border: 1px solid #000; } .k-table td, table td { padding: 5px; } Established in 1998, Pan Group (PAN or the Group) is an existing IFC investee in Vietnam and a publicly listed group of agribusiness companies aiming to benefit from the fast growing and fragmented agricultural and food sectors in Vietnam. PAN currently controls the leading distributor and producer of crop seeds named National Seed Corporation (NSC), a new flower and farming venture Pan-Saladbowl JSC (Pan-Saladbowl), an integrated pangasius and clam processor in the Mekong Delta named Ben Tre Aquaproduct Import and Export JSC (ABT), and an important cashew processor named Long An Food Processing Export JSC (LAF) in addition to its 43.7% interest in a leading confectionary producer Bibica Corporation (BBC). PAN established two holding intermediary subsidiaries Pan Farm JSC (Pan Farm or the Company), which holds the shares of NSC and Pan-Saladbowl, and Pan Food JSC, which holds the shares of ABT, LAF and BBC. The purpose of the Project is to support the Companys expansion plan in the agriculture and food sectors.
